snippet.title: Cronos: The New Dawn - BIG Details Revealed in Dev Diary | FGS LIVE FROM GDC
snippet.description:
Developer Bloober Team revealed major new details about their upcoming survival horror game, Cronos: The New Dawn, and answered many fans' burning questions during FGS Live from GDC in an exclusive dev diary. They also unveiled some of the key influences behind this chilling story of time travel, the world of 1980s Poland, and the cataclysmic event known as The Change. Cronos: The New Dawn comes to PS5, Xbox and PC later this year.

https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

#FutureGamesShow #FGS #cronos 

Future Publishing uses the Epidemic Sound Library and Adobe Creative Cloud Generative AI features
